document_data.name: the Nightbleat Tavern
document_data.mainbody: The '''Nightbleat Tavern''' was the lone tavern found in the small village of [[Bospir]] in [[Cormyr]] in the 1360s [[DR]].
document_data.Activity: Brawls were common within this establishment as this was the only logical place in Bospir where the inebriated sheepshearers could unload on each other.
